title: Sylvan Scimitar
content:
Sylvan Scimitar Uncommon 2~7 Damage 1d6+1 Slashing Melee Caster: Instead of its Dexterity Modifier, the affected entity add its Spellcasting Ability Modifier to Attack Rolls. Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Everything moves strangely in the Feywild from rivers to behaviours. It's a mercurial place, where the magical and physical can pass permeably through one another. Scimitar Light Finesse 1.35 65
